story_message: You're a naughty boy going around opening chests and boxes that aren't yours. Let's make a deal. You help me seal the contents back inside my box and in exchange I will grant you the power of the stars.;But first, could you tell me your name little one?
Pleasure doing business with you. I do hope you have a map of this labyrinth. It really would be a shame if we got lost in here and met an unfortunate end. Perhaps we will even find some treasure.

I'm so glad to see you're still here in one piece. You may have to venture back into those ruins to acquire a weapon. There is a fortress nearby. I'd like you to steal something notable and come back. That should prove both your loyalty and ability.

I'm impressed with your findings. It would seem my celestial energy has been scattered and is mutating your world. Bring me any more stones you find that are infused with traces of my energy.;This should help me to regain my power.
You've been very helpful, but I'll be honest. You're really not anywhere near strong enough yet. I can help you improve your equipment, but you need to show me that you are qualified to use it.
Glad to see you can keep up on the ground. Is that still true for the skies? Astratha is already bringing the dragons onto your world. We need to secure you a pair of wings.
Hopefully you got some wings refined, we've got more company inbound.
You're still not ready. A paragon will be here soon. You must become stronger before then.
Aurora is nearby. We need to seal some of his power or he will be the only fortress left standing.

The mortal plane is safe for now. Let's take this opportunity to improve your skills some more. Once you're ready we'll head into the fiends abyss. Remember this is a one way trip and once you're in there is no turning back.
To protect the mortal plane we must purge these horrors. I won't be of much assistance in combat anymore. Use the power I have granted to you and wipe out every last one.
I sense Astratha is nearby. Finally we have a chance to bring an end to this madness. Dragons are a blight upon this world from the outer dimensions and we will not allow them to usurp this world.

I'm sorry… I've miscalculated. I did not think Tyra would be able to manifest in this plane. This is a disaster. If Tyra has come here then it's only a matter of time until the others make their move.

I'm impressed by how much you've grown so quickly. It looks like the True Paragons have not yet breached this dimension. We must take the fight to them and to do that we have to find a way to cross over into the outer dimensions.
It seems remnants of Astratha are still lingering. If we gather enough of them perhaps we can reforge his wings. With this maybe we can traverse the dimensional rift.
quest_message: Equip a pair of Dimensional Wings

story_message: Be Proud. You've accomplished something today no other mortal has. Unfortunately it looks like we have problems to attend to. Not that I'm surprised. We as good as walked in the front gate.
This is the power of a True Paragon. Claim it as your own and ascend to new heights. We'll be on the same playing field as them for now.
We must continue to seal as many of them as we can. If we cannot reclaim enough of my power before we meet one of the High Three then all is lost.
Any one of these Paragons can bring an end to everything you love. We cannot show them any mercy.
